Text: Re Gas Purchase and Sale ContractDebra Christy Finelli has directed me to your attention in connection with my request to put in place a Gas Purchase and Sales Contract and Net Settlement Agreement between Tenaska III Texas Partners and Enron North America Corp Would you be so kind as to provide me with the appropriate documentation to get the ball rolling on these two contracts Please let me know if you have any questions or require additional information from me at this point Thank you Debra Chris Van Scyoc Supervisor Contract Administration Phone Fax AM I am not the right person if you want a master agreement with our sister company Enron North America I handle matters for Enron Energy Services I am copying Debra Perlingiere who is with ENA Legal and hopefully can help you with this request Thanks Christy Finelli Chris Van Scyoc on AM To cc Subject Gas Purchase and Sale Contract Christy Sharon Heck of our office has given me your name as a contact to get a Gas Purchase and Sale Contract in place between Tenaska III Texas Partners and Enron North America Corp We would also be interested in executing a Net Settlement Agreement between these two parties as well Please provide me with the appropriate documentation to get the ball rolling on these two contracts If you are not the appropriate person to contact regarding negotiation of these documents please either direct this email to the appropriate person or contact me with the individuals name number email address etc Alternatively can these documents be executed electronically via EnronOnline Thank you for your help Christy Chris Van Scyoc Supervisor Contract Administration Phone Fax This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you
